meanings.definition: One who seeks to make a profit.
meanings.sent1: The profiters in the market aim to earn money.
meanings.sent2: The profiters invested wisely and gained a financial return.
meanings.sent3: The profiters at the flea market found a hidden gem among the items.
meanings.sent4: Like bees collecting nectar, the profiters gather wealth diligently.
meanings.sent5: The profiters' eyes gleamed with the promise of riches.

meanings.definition: Those who profit or benefit from a situation.
meanings.sent1: During the crisis, the profiters took advantage of the chaos.
meanings.sent2: The profiters enjoyed the perks of the successful project.
meanings.sent3: The profiters at the party indulged in the delicious food.
meanings.sent4: The profiters basked in the glow of their good fortune.
meanings.sent5: The profiters thrived in the favorable conditions.
